segments.text: Where do you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to go to Lid Hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but you got on the wrong bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which bus should I take then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should change to the No . 701 bus at the next stop .
segments.speaker: S1
